tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE trade_settlement_data (
    trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trade_date DATE,
    settlement_amount DECIMAL,
    counterparty_name VARCHAR(255),
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50),
    regulatory_compliance BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE trade_settlements (
  trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trade_date DATE,
  security VARCHAR(50),
  quantity INT,
  settlement_amount DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE trade_settlements (
    settlement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trade_id INT NOT NULL,
    settlement_date DATE,
    trade_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    settlement_status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE trades (
    trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trader_id INT NOT NULL,
    trade_date DATE,
    trade_type VARCHAR(20),
    trade_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    trade_currency VARCHAR(3)
);

CREATE TABLE regulatory_compliance (
    compliance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trade_id INT NOT NULL,
    compliance_status VARCHAR(20),
    regulatory_entity_name VARCHAR(50),
    compliance_check_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE trade_settlements (
    settlement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trade_id INT NOT NULL,
    settlement_date DATE NOT NULL,
    settlement_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    regulatory_compliance VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE trade_details (
    trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trader_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    trade_date DATE NOT NULL,
    trade_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    trade_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_history (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trade_id INT NOT NULL,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    transaction_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE trades (
  trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trade_type VARCHAR(255),
  trade_date DATE,
  counterparty VARCHAR(255),
  settlement_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  compliance_status BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE trade_details (
  trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  details TEXT,
  settlement_status VARCHAR(255),
  escrow_account VARCHAR(255),
  settlement_date DATE,
  CONSTRAINT fk_trade_id FOREIGN KEY (trade_id) REFERENCES trades(trade_id)
);

CREATE TABLE trade_parties (
  party_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  party_name VARCHAR(255),
  party_type VARCHAR(50),
  contact_person VARCHAR(100),
  address VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE trade_history (
  history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trade_id INT,
  action VARCHAR(50),
  action_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  CONSTRAINT fk_trade_id FOREIGN KEY (trade_id) REFERENCES trades(trade_id)
);
